product_name: Shimano XT M780 SPD Bike Pedals
long_description: Sturdy and ready for the trail, the Shimano XT M780 SPD mountain bike pedals offer quick, adjustable dual-sided entry and a mud-shedding design to ensure easy, durable performance.
short_description: Sturdy and ready for the trail, the Shimano XT M780 SPD mountain bike pedals offer quick, adjustable dual-sided entry and a mud-shedding design to ensure easy, durable performance.
